name: Truth or Dare Dirty & Evil
description:
Truth or Dare is a drinking game, created for party animals, teens, college students, college dropouts, bachelorettes and all the other party people that want to drink to start their night.

Game can be played offline, without WIFI, and it consists of a bunch of cards you read to your friends. It's a perfect game against your sobriety.

We made this game because you and your friends are boring and you can’t come up with funny stuff that gets you drunk yourself.

-----! FEATURES !-----

- 900+ Cards
- 8 Packs
- Hours of getting to know your friends
- For 2 players minimum
- Hours of fun
- Hating your friends and humanity in the end
- Public embarrassment and disappointment

-----! HOW TO PLAY !-----

- Choose truth or dare
- Answer the sexy questions or do the dares, as you are told by the game
- If you don't want to do the dare, or answer the question, drink 2

"Now I know all of my friends are horrible human beings and I can't look them in the eye but it was fun so I guess it was worth it"
